title: Reflective Practitioner-Centered Instructional Support Design in Online Language Assessment Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Most learners rely on mobile environments (smartphones) without PC access; VR simulations are mobile-optimized. Operates with formative assessment focus, emphasizing real-time feedback and reflective practice.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three self-assessment strategies using metacognition in online assessment environments to improve time management skills by 20%.
Learners can achieve an 80% or higher task completion rate by utilizing clear platform guidance during VR simulation-based assignments.
Learners can analyze weekly learning experiences through reflective practice journaling and complete improvement plans with 100% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
